concept.title: Release notes
concept.shortdesc: Couchbase Server 4.1 Developer Preview (DP) is an early developer milestone update in the Couchbase 4.x series. It provides you with an opportunity to try out the new enhancements that are still under active development, and give us feedback. Couchbase Server 4.0 introduced several major innovations including multidimensional scaling (MDS), global secondary indexes (GSI), and N1QL. These capabilities greatly extended the scalability and performance advantages of Couchbase Server, as well as the ability to support a much broader set of use cases.

conbody.p: Couchbase Server 4.1 DP introduces covering indexes, an exciting new N1QL enhancement for developers. 4.1 Developer Preview certifies two new platforms, Windows 10 and OS X El Capitan, for development and testing purposes only. Additionally, this release also provides several important bug fixes that fortify the 4.0 release.
Couchbase Server 4.1 Developer Preview is released in November 2015.
